id.title: Email ID
id.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

unique_email_id.title: Unique Email ID
unique_email_id.description: An identifier for the address across all of Mailchimp.

email_type.title: Email Type
email_type.description: Type of email this member asked to get ('html' or 'text').

merge_fields.title: Member Merge Var
merge_fields.description: An individual merge var and value for a member.

additionalProperties.description: This object's keys are merge tags (like FNAME). It's values are the values to be added to the merge field.

interests.title: Subscriber Interests
interests.description: The key of this object's properties is the ID of the interest in question.

additionalProperties.title: Interest Value
additionalProperties.description: Keys are interest IDs, values are booleans that describe whether the list member is in that group or not.

stats.title: Subscriber Stats
stats.description: Open and click rates for this subscriber.

ip_signup.title: Signup IP
ip_signup.description: IP address the subscriber signed up from.

timestamp_signup.title: Signup Timestamp
timestamp_signup.description: The date and time the subscriber signed up for the list in ISO 8601 format.

ip_opt.title: Opt-in IP
ip_opt.description: The IP address the subscriber used to confirm their opt-in status.

timestamp_opt.title: Opt-in Timestamp
timestamp_opt.description: The date and time the subscriber confirmed their opt-in status in ISO 8601 format.

member_rating.title: Member Rating
member_rating.description: Star rating for this member, between 1 and 5.

last_changed.title: Last Changed Date
last_changed.description: The date and time the member's info was last changed in ISO 8601 format.

gmtoff.title: GMT Offset
gmtoff.description: The time difference in hours from GMT.

dstoff.title: DST Offset
dstoff.description: The offset for timezones where daylight saving time is observed.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: The unique code for the location country.

last_note.title: Notes
last_note.description: The most recent Note added about this member.

created_at.title: Created Time
created_at.description: The date and time the note was created in ISO 8601 format.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.
